name: Ruth_Whiteside
text:
Ruth Whiteside
Ruth Whiteside was the mother of Jack Parsons.
Upon learning of her son's death, Ruth took a fatal dose of pills.
Behind the scenes
Ruth Virginia Whiteside (c. 1891 – June 17, 1952) was the mother of Jack Parsons.
Upon hearing of her son's death, she committed suicide by overdosing on barbiturates.
